reviewText: This is a very good movie selection and you get 3 movies on this purchase.  I think you would enjoy the movies. I recommend  you buying this and watching on a cold Winter day or a rainy one.
Three of Brad Pitt's best roles in one package.  Devil's own is often overlooked, be sure to check it out!!! highly recommend!

Legends of the Fall and A River Runs Through It are just beautiful movies! The scenery is gorgeous, the stories are epic, and of course Brad Pitt is easy on the eyes! If you like dramas and want to get lost in a great story, all of these movies will pull you in and make you think.
Delivery was prompt but the condition of the packaging could have been better described. I have only watched one of the movies and it played without issue.
Great set of DVD's to watch to escape the now and be in the past.

This was a threefer I couldn't pass up. I wanted to become more familiar with Brad Pitt's work, and here we are.
All are good movies.
A River Runs Through It was what I was looking for, however you cannot beat the price on the trio of these very excellent movies.  Totally pleased.
Great value
Fantastic movie set.  A good bargin.

I love everything that Brad Pitt does...specially some of his earlier movies...and Legnds of the Fall and A River Runs Through it are two of his best as far as I am concerned...they definitely do not disappoint...
Item as described.
Everything was has promised!
The acting in all three movies are superb.  The scenery and backdrops in Legends of the Fall are absolutely beautiful.  I highly recommend watching all of these movies.

A beautiful story written about a man and his family raised in Missoula, Montana, From the onset when he and his brothers were about age 10.

  It is from that point that this true recollection of life.

  One might ask as to how would I know?  I live in Montana and I know the true nature of this story and know of the authors.  Thanks.

I bought this triple feature set for my husband after realizing that he hadn't seen the Brad Pitt classics, Legends of the Fall and A River Runs Through It. We enjoyed watching the movies together and he like all of them even though he had thought they would be "chick flicks."
Love these movies !  Good price
Replacing all my favorite VHS movies with DVD's. Great combo here.
one of our favorite movies at a terrific value.
Great movies.

These are three excellent Brad Pitt films, although Legends of the Fall is my personal favorite, they are all good. Each movie comes packaged in it's own case, and special features are available for those who appreciate those. Legends of the Fall is an epic movie in all respects, the story, acting, cast and cinematography are fantastic. The other two movies are very good also, Robert Redford directs A River Runs Through It, and The Devils Own is more of a thriller than the other two movies. I highly recommend this movie collection.
